MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the G82 area of Dumbarton, affecting properties in Back Street and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 6pm due to safe excavation work being required near the Renton Primary School and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:46pm on Monday, 19 April 2021
